name: Swirlix

evolution.description: Swirlix can evolve into Slurpuff at level 9 and above with the help of a Whipped Dream. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Cotton Candy Pokémon. To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Any ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to the sleep condition.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is not holding an item, it gains 10 feet to its speed.
